mapper.select: SELECT CATE_CODE , CATE_NAME FROM CATEGORY ORDER BY CATE_CODE
SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(IMG_CODE, 5, 3)))+1, 1) AS IMG_CODE FROM ITEM_IMG
SELECT COUNT(I.ITEM_CODE) FROM ITEM I , ITEM_IMG IMG WHERE I.ITEM_CODE = IMG.ITEM_CODE AND IS_MAIN = 'Y'

SELECT ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_STOCK, ITEM_STATUS, ATTACHED_IMG_NAME, RNUM FROM ( SELECT ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_STOCK, ITEM_STATUS, ATTACHED_IMG_NAME, ROWNUM RNUM FROM( SELECT I.ITEM_CODE , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , ITEM_STOCK , ITEM_STATUS , ATTACHED_IMG_NAME FROM ITEM I , ITEM_IMG IMG WHERE I.ITEM_CODE = IMG.ITEM_CODE AND IS_MAIN = 'Y') ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} and #{endRow}
SELECT ID , NAME , TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOIN_DATE FROM MEMBER
SELECT ID , NAME , TELL , ROAD_ADDR , DETAIL_ADDR , GENDER , EMAIL , TO_CHAR(BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BIRTHDAY , TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOIN_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
